title: DormAce : HOSTEL-MART
description: DormAce is a digital platform designed to simplify hostel life by providing a structured and secure marketplace for students. It enables residents to buy, sell, and request items within their hostel community, replacing unorganized group-based trading with a smart and efficient system.

title: Pg-life
description: PG Life is a web platform designed to help students and professionals easily find and manage paying guest (PG) accommodations. The site provides a simple and user-friendly experience where users can explore available properties, view details such as location, pricing, and amenities, and register or log in to access personalized features.

title: Share with Care
description: Share with Care is a web-based platform designed to reduce food waste and ensure surplus food reaches those in need. It connects restaurants, hotels, and messes with NGOs, allowing them to donate or sell excess food at minimal costs

title: PT Adventure Game
description: Pikachu Torch Adventure is something new and a small, browser-based arcade game. Move Pikachu with your mouse to collect coins, avoid bombs, grab power-ups, find the level key, and upgrade your torch for an enhanced view and bonuses.

title: Gemini integration
description: A lightweight, production-ready starter template for integrating Google Gemini 3 / 2.5 models into a Node.js environment using Express.

title: Extra-Pro-Calculator
description: The Colorful Calculator is a sleek and user-friendly web-based calculator with multiple color themes to enhance the user experience. It performs basic arithmetic operations while allowing users to switch between vibrant color modes for a personalized touch.
